post.description: Obtain an OAuth2 access token using password grant type.

get.summary: server-capabilities: Fetch the server FHIR CapabilityStatement
read-instance: Read Patient instance

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The resource ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The resource ID

requestBody.description: Send Valid FHIR Patient information to update as JSON (be sure to include the "ID" element for the Patient)

get.summary: search-type: Search for Patient instances

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: Number of records to use as the page size for paginated search. The maximum page size for this Resource is 50

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: This is an Optional Date in the format _lastUpdated=gtDATE, _lastUpdated=eqDATE and _lastUpdated=leDATE in the format yyyy-mm-dd

parameters.name: address-postalcode
parameters.description: A postalCode specified in an address

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Whether the patient record is active (true|false)

parameters.name: birthdate
parameters.description: This is the patient's Date of birth - Valid format yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: A value in an email contact

parameters.name: family
parameters.description: This is the patient's last name - Supports exact matches

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: This is the patient's gender - male, female, or unknown

parameters.name: general-practitioner
parameters.description: Patient's nominated general practitioner, not the organization that manages the record

parameters.name: given
parameters.description: A portion of the given name of the patient

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: This is a List of Identifiers for a Patient. Valid Identifier Systems are MRN with a system value of https://www.hl7.org/fhir/v2/0203/index.html#v2-0203-MR, SSN with a system value of http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/us-ssn, or PMS to be used for the PMS Id

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language code (irrespective of use value)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page to be used for paginated search

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: A value in a phone contact

parameters.name: us-core-ethnicity
parameters.description: Returns patients with an ethnicity extension matching the specified code. Detailed Extension specification can be found at: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-ethnicity.

parameters.name: us-core-race
parameters.description: Returns patients with a race extension matching the specified code. Detailed Extension specification can be found at: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-race.

parameters.name: referral-source
parameters.description: If the Patient has been assigned a Referral Source in MMPM, this will be a reference to that ID. Referral Sources can be found by querying the following Value Set: {base url}/{firm_url_prefix}/ema/fhir/v2/ValueSet/referral-source

requestBody.description: Send Valid FHIR Patient information in JSON

parameters.name: identifier

parameters.name: page

get.summary: Get All Encounters for a Practice

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: Number of records to use as the page size for paginated search. The maximum page size for this Resource is 50

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: This is an Optional Date in the format _lastUpdated=gtDATE, _lastUpdated=eqDATE and _lastUpdated=leDATE in the format yyyy-mm-dd

parameters.name: appointment
parameters.description: The appointment that scheduled this encounter

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: A date within the period the Encounter lasted

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page to be used for paginated search

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The patient or group present at the encounter

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: planned | arrived | triaged | in-progress | onleave | finished | cancelled +

get.summary: Retrieve Coverage details for an ID (Note: this is the specific coverage ID, not the Patient ID) In order to get this ID, you’d want to do a Coverage search with the ‘patient=value’ parameter.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The resource ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The resource ID

requestBody.description: Send Valid Coverage information to be updated in JSON form

get.summary: Retrieve Coverage resources meeting the specified search criteria

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: Number of records to use as the page size for paginated search. The maximum page size for this Resource is 100

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: This is an Optional Date in the format _lastUpdated=gtDATE, _lastUpdated=eqDATE and _lastUpdated=leDATE in the format yyyy-mm-dd

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order of the insurance policy, it can be 1= Primary , 2= Secondary 3 = Tertiary

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page to be used for paginated search

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: The unique Patient Identifier

parameters.name: reconciliationId
parameters.description: Reconciliation Id Received from  a successful Coverage CREATE call

requestBody.description: Send Valid FHIR Coverage information in JSON

get.summary: Retrieve Document by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The resource ID

get.summary: Retrieve Document resources meeting the specified search criteria

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: Number of records to use as the page size for paginated search. The maximum page size for this Resource is 10

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The original upload date in format of yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSZ

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: File extension type, this is an optional field, e.g. ccda, note

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: File title, this is an optional field

parameters.name: encounter
parameters.description: Context of the document content

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Document reference identifier, can be search by filename passing the identifier filename and the value in format filename|value. This is an optional field

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page to be used for paginated search

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: Patient reference url in format : /resoucrename/id or id, this is a mandatory field.

parameters.name: requisition
parameters.description: Composite Request ID

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: File extension type, this is an optional field e.g. type=pdf

requestBody.description: Send Valid FHIR doccument attribute in JSON

get.summary: Retrieve All Appointments for a Practice/Firm

parameters.name: _count
parameters.description: Number of records to use as the page size for paginated search. The maximum page size for this Resource is 50

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: This is an Optional Date in the format _lastUpdated=gtDATE, _lastUpdated=eqDATE and _lastUpdated=leDATE in the format yyyy-mm-dd

parameters.name: appointment-type
parameters.description: The style of appointment or patient that has been booked in the slot (not service type)

parameters.name: created
parameters.description: Created date in format of yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSZ

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Appointment date/time.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: This location is listed in the participants of the appointment

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page to be used for paginated search

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: One of the individuals of the appointment is this patient

parameters.name: practitioner
parameters.description: One of the individuals of the appointment is this practitioner

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The overall status of the appointment

parameters.name: supporting-info
parameters.description: Additional information to support the appointment

requestBody.description: Send Valid appointment attribute in JSON

get.summary: Search for a slot

parameters.name: appointment-type
parameters.description: The style of appointment or patient that may be booked in the slot

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The param "date" supports date with prefix of eq in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSZ format AND date range with start date with ge prefix and yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSZ format and end date with le prefix and yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSSSSSZ format

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: List of identifiers to search by for Slots. Valid Identifier Systems are PRN with a system value of https://www.hl7.org/fhir/v2/0203/index.html#v2-0203-PRN which is used for Provider id,  FI with a system value of https://www.hl7.org/fhir/v2/0203/index.html#v2-0203-FI which is used for Location id
